questionTitle: Which of the following type is not supported by workspaces in Acrobat?
questionExplanation: Workspaces do not support audio or video file types.

questionOption1: Documents stored in the cloud is fully secure and are certainly under a user’s full control
questionOption2: Online productivity applications generally have fewer features than their shrink-wrapped competitors
questionOption3: Data in the cloud cannot be lost and must be managed and backed up
questionExplanation: Documents stored in the cloud may not be secure and are certainly not under a user’s full control.

questionTitle: ____________ is a collection of integrated applications that are packaged within a complete desktop environment.
questionExplanation: Glide is compatible with Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Safari.

questionTitle: Which of the following standard business application is supported by Glide?
questionExplanation: Crunch is used to create spreadsheets.

questionOption1: Documents created with desktop applications are fully compatible with cloud-based applications
questionOption2: Buzzword supports the roles of coauthor, reviewer, and reader for a document
questionOption3: Buzzword is cross compatible with other Office suites
questionExplanation: Documents created with desktop applications may not be fully compatible with cloud-based applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an online storage drive that stores files within a container?
questionExplanation: Collaboration is a meeting and blog tool.

questionTitle: Which of the following office applications allows users to create, modify, share, and work on documents collaboratively by Google?
questionExplanation: Google Docs is supported on Linux, Macintosh OS X, and Microsoft Windows, as well as on Android and iPhone mobile phones.

questionTitle: Which of the following type is not supported for mobile application viewing for Google docs?
questionExplanation: Google Docs creates native HTML files that are stored online.

questionTitle: Microsoft’s Office Web Apps are written in _______ and eventually are to be supplemented with Silverlight features.
questionExplanation: Microsoft’s Office Web Apps are online slimmed-down versions of the Microsoft Office suite.

questionTitle: Office Web Apps can be accessed through Windows Live ________ using a SharePoint Server.
questionExplanation: Skydrive can be a repository for your desktop office files or can serve as an online file share.
